thumb.title: [TAS] NES スウィートホーム by Samsara, stevenqbeatz, AmaizumiUni & kill_me in 08:57.33
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0NDnMlmLRA以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6618M TAS originally published on 2025-06-27In this landmark movie, the efforts of Samsara ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Samsara ), stevenqbeatz ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/stevenqbeatz), AmaizumiUni ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/AmaizumiUni), and kill_me were combined to create a run that beats the game in less than 9 minutes with all five characters alive. Numerous glitches and strategies have been found and created that break the game so thoroughly that the final result barely resembles the experience of a survival horror game. For details on what glitches were involved and how they work, you can read the authors' notes ( https://tasvideos.org/9750S ).There are alternate encodes that reduce the flashing that happens during enemy fights.
thumb.last_res_body: えみはたぐちパー... 移動バグで○○のれ... セーブリセットし... 歩数稼ぎで-127か... エンカウント待ち...

tags.tag: ダンジョンをかけぬけろ!シリーズ
ダンジョンをすりぬけろ!シリーズ
